name: claudecode-plugins
description: Marketplace de plugins da comunidade para Claude Code

plugins.name: git-commit-helper
plugins.description: Automatiza commits Git com validações completas, conventional commits e integração com CI/CD. Suporte automático para projetos Python com uv (universal virtualenv). NOVO: /quick-commit para commits rápidos sem validações extensivas

plugins.name: python-test-generator
plugins.description: Intelligent Python test generator with three-phase strategy (analyze → maintain → create). Smart fixtures architecture support with automatic reuse. Zero test duplication, guaranteed 80% coverage.

plugins.name: code-review
plugins.description: Análise estática de código com gerenciamento integrado de débito técnico, identificando bugs, vulnerabilidades e melhorias em qualquer linguagem

plugins.name: langchain-langgraph-specialist
plugins.description: Especialista completo em LangChain v1 e LangGraph v1 com acesso à documentação oficial via MCP - desenvolvimento, debugging e melhores práticas para chains, agentes e grafos

plugins.name: llm-eval-developer
plugins.description: Assistente especializado para desenvolver evaluations de LLMs com OpenEvals, LangSmith e melhores práticas - gera código, padrões e estruturas completas de evaluation - NOVO: Benchmarking comparativo com LangChain/LangGraph

plugins.name: incremental-dev
plugins.description: Master incremental development with YAGNI principles and Evolutionary Architecture - avoid over-engineering and promote simplicity. Consolidated 5 core commands for streamlined workflow: initialize projects, manage PRD, add features, check code quality, and update configuration. NEW: Validate existing PRD.md against template structure.

plugins.name: github-actions-cicd
plugins.description: Plugin especializado em CI/CD usando GitHub Actions com implementação incremental seguindo princípio YAGNI - cria, mantém e evolui workflows com segurança e boas práticas

plugins.name: agentc-ai-developer
plugins.description: Brief Minimo methodology with integrated microprocessos: /brief (Microprocesso 1.1 planning) → /setup-local-observability (Microprocesso 1.2 setup) → /spike-agentic (Microprocesso 1.3 spike) → /backlog (incremental development with prioritization scores and issue tracking) → /analyze-slices (S2.1 validation) → /iniciar-slice (S2.2 dev start) → /novo-incremento (S2.2 incremental loop) → /finalizar-incremento (S2.2 validation loop). Eight commands with gates validation, metrics tracking, coverage validation (≥70%), regression detection, and automatic decision logic. help-assistant and developer-increment agents with PROACTIVE MCP integration - auto-fetch LangChain/LangGraph docs and automate increment planning. microprocesso-1-2 and spike-agentic skills for progressive disclosure. Full incremental development workflow with metrics validation. MCP integration via langchain-docs server.

plugins.name: kubernetes-specialist
plugins.description: Advanced plugin for Kubernetes resource management, troubleshooting, and best practices implementation with MCP integration. Features: diagnostic commands for pod failures, resource optimization for cost reduction, manifest generation with security hardening, 2 agents with MCP kubernetes-toolkit integration and skill-first knowledge loading, 2 comprehensive skills for best practices and troubleshooting patterns, and MCP server for direct Kubernetes API access. 2025 best practices addressing 99.94% industry over-provisioning issue.
